page.title: 07 THE FAMILY
page.content: A TYPICAL BOY> My name is Guy Terry. I am 9 years old. I live in a modern house. It is built of brick and has a tiled roof. I like to play with the computer. I have three meals a day, breakfast,dinner and tea. I go to school at 9 o'clock and I go home at 3.45. We have school dinner in the village hall, but on Saturday and Sunday I have dinner at home.I have a brother,Mark. He is seven. I have 2 bicycles but one is very rusty. I have my own bedroom and I own a little patch of garden to grow plants.
